doubleDown(Card) - Method in class blackjack.Player
This function gets the value of the actual bet of associated to the current hand in play, than debits it in players balance, doubles the value of the bet and adds a card to the hand in play from the list of hands.
drawCardToDealer() - Method in class blackjack.Dealer
Adds a new card to the hand of the dealer, this card is took from the shoe.
drawFirstFour(Player) - Method in class blackjack.Dealer
Distributes the first four cards of the game, the first two are dealt to the dealer and the next two to the player.
